data.title: Military Operations Analyst / Modeling and Simulation in Nashua, New Hampshire, United States
meta_keywords: Military Operations Analyst / Modeling and Simulation
data.meta_description: Apply for Military Operations Analyst / Modeling and Simulation job with BAE Systems in Nashua, New Hampshire, United States. Engineering & Technology at BAE Systems
data.text:
Security Clearance Requirements

Who is considered a U.S. Person? A U.S. citizen, a U.S. national, a lawful permanent resident, a protected refugee or asylee, or you must be eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. Learn more about the ITAR here.

Security Clearance: Many of our positions require the ability to obtain a U.S. Security Clearance for which the U.S. Government requires U.S. Citizenship. Please review the Clearance Level section in the posting for more details.
